description: Offering a 1025 square feet of space, spacious builder floor for a competitive sale price of Rs. 40,00,000. You will find 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with this builder floor along with 1 parking facility. The property lies in Powai which is a prime location in Mumbai and is close to public transportation and which is a safe & secure neighborhood. This furnished property is a garden facing builder floor tower C on the 6th floor of a 7 storied building and this is 5-7 years old construction. This project has some of the best amenities which includes 24 hour security, badminton court, inbuilt wardrobes, clubhouse, central air conditioning.

description: Find a stylish and luxurious builder floor for sale at an affordable rate of Rs. 23,00,000 with total area of 640 square feet. This well ventilated property comes with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, making it suitable for bachelors. The property is situated at Thane, a prime location in Mumbai and in a safe & secure neighborhood. This is a semi-furnished, north-east facing property in Block A and is in 12th floor within a building that has 26 floors in all. It is 6 years old property. There are numerous amenities available including 24x7 security, cycle/jogging track, playing zones for children and visitors’ parking.

description: A great deal for buyers who will appreciate this spacious builder floor offering 850 sq ft of space at an reasonable sale price of Rs. 52,00,000.
